name: HC Andersen Pic-2-Word
description: Play and improve your reading, recognition and understanding of words from the fairy tales of Hans Christian Andersen: The Ugly Duckling, The Little Mermaid and The Tinderbox.   Combine image, sound and sign of meaningful words from the three fairytales in English and 14 additional languages in this easy-to-use word-quiz game. Train your attention, reaction and get high scores.   -Play in English and 14 additional languages.   -Meet the characters and objects from each of the fairy tales.   -Try 3 different game modes, using different learning-approaches to literacy and language.   -Playable by ages 2 and up. Play together or compete against one another for high scores.   -Play with more than 400 words in 15 languages.   -15 languages supported: Catalan, Chinese, Danish, Dutch, English (UK), English (US), Finnish, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish.   -Easy to use for even the youngest kids (reading skills not mandatory to play).   -No in-game purchases or links to websites.
